QuestData.Title: In Tents Channeling
QuestData.Description: The yaungol of Fire Camp Ordo are the worst threat we're facing. I need you to head west and take out their leader.$B$BThe coward is hiding in a cave, which is protected by a fire shield cast by his four underlings.$B$BTake them out and the shield will come down. You'll find them in their tents, channeling.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Ordo Embercaller, Ordo Pyromancer, Ordo Firespeaker, and Ordo Blazecaster.
